titleStmt.title: The answer of the chancellor, masters and scholars of the Vniversity of Oxford, to the petition, articles of grievance, and reasons of the city of Oxon presented to the honorable committee for regulating the University of Oxford the 24. of July, 1649.
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.
Langbaine, Gerard, 1656-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hall, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: The University's reply, made at the request of a Parliamentary committee, was composed chiefly by Gerard Langbaine, keeper of the archives. An account of the circumstances, see Madan 2019.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
